name: Snake (itch) (Xhite)
description:
Doesn't offer anything new. It was created to demonstrate basic game development skills.

If single egg mode is unselected, eggs may change location over time; in single egg mode, there will always be a single egg, and it will remain at the stable position until the snake eats it.

In the game mode, the Esc key pauses the game; also, this is how you can quit the game in game mode.
